text: Ronald Reagan Day is a state holiday in California, Illinois and Wisconsin.http://www.fox11online.com/dpp/news/wisconsin/the-wisconsin-budget- and-you It is celebrated on February 6 each year. The holiday is to remember the life of Ronald Reagan. All state government offices, community colleges, schools, and libraries are closed. For the 100th anniversary of Reagan's birthday in 2011, governors in 21 states declared February 6 to be Ronald Reagan Day. ==References== Category:Presidential birthdays in the United States Category:California Category:Wisconsin Category:Illinois Category:Things named after Ronald Reagan Category:February observances
title: Ronald Reagan Day
